pageTitle: Shoei RF-1100 Enigma TC-4 Helmet - LeatherUp.com
textBeforeTable: Shoei Helmets Size Chart 0113-0204-03 Manufacturers Part Number 5-Year Warranty From Purchase Date. 7-Year Warranty From Helmet Manufacture Date. Whichever comes first. Nylon Drawstring Helmet Bag (Included) Maintenance Kit (Included) Chin Curtain (Included) can be inserted into the lower edge of the chin bar to reduce wind turbulence and noise. Breath Guard (Included) can be inserted into the upper edge of the chin bar to help reduce fogging by diverted exhausted breath down out the bottom of the helmet. SHOEI offers an industry-leading five shell sizes in the new X-Twelve to ensure a custom fit for heads between the sizes of XS-XXL. Item Details Shoei RF-1100 Enigma TC-4 Helmet Unrivaled in every feature category, there's not another helmet on the market that truly embodies motorcycling quite like the RF-1100.
